Here's to many more birthday celebrations with my favorite internet hamster! Eimi love!!!

<3

86879317.text:
Happy Birthday Eimi!!

Another great year has come and gone and an eventful one at that. You blew up a school, built a chair, became Elden Lord, got a lobotomy.. y'know typical hamster antics. You even became a senpa- I mean a mom! But more than anything last year hits home why I couldn't see having anyone else as my oshi, youâ€™re truly one of a kind. What might start as a simple drawing stream or zatsu will somehow turn into labbing another bit about jorkin it or watching videos on dinosaur themed love hotels. You can never really predict how an Eimi stream is gonna go and it just keeps me coming back for more. And on top of that youâ€™ve formed a great community filled with so many kind, eccentric, and accepting people and it's all thanks to you. All of your hard work and talent as a streamer, singer, artist and as our boss make you truly special (and I mean that both ways) to all of us and I hope you know that.

Happy Birthday Boss, Keep on being you. - LabMem#6400

86879787.text:
Wowzers, Eimi Isami from Phase Connect's third generation of talents Phase Euphoria is three years old? That's nuts! I've already done the whole song and dance of "I love the way you're able to put insane effort into your works" or "Your very niche but usually immaculate game selection is a lot more fun compared to just flavor of the month content" or whatever. Pretty sure you've also heard all about how great the labhams have been as a little community of dumb stupid morons. They even care about all the dumb niche references and walls of texts I force upon them like twice or three times a week. I mean it works both ways tbh, I would never have cared about the umas or the 100 lines if it wasn't for the gangle of morons I love hanging around with and the big kahuna we all worship like insane people. (I mean we ARE all insane, but point still stands.)

Honestly I don't really have any bits this time and I don't want to cause any of the yap mucus so... Happy birthday bossman, stay woke my goat, and much love, you idiot.

P.S. Reoccurring Bit. Here's a strawberry.ğŸ“

86880340.text:
Hey boss,

Dunno how "internet hamster girl" managed to be one of the funniest people I've ever known, but I keep finding myself laughing out loud every single stream. You are unbelievably talented in so many ways, and work so hard just to make us smile every weeknight - thank you Eimi, and happy birthday!!

86880538.text:
Happy hamuhamuday Eimi!

So much happened this year it's crazy to look back on. From watching you trying and failing to pick up girls in HuniePop because you're straight, to introducing us to your new daughter (tell Hazelnut I said hi), all the way to getting tricked into watching the most emotionally devasting game about dementia that a ham could imagine; this year really had everything. And of course I have to praise you for outdoing yourself with all of the covers and concerts, Curren Chan would be proud.

Thanks for the endless entertainment and for being yourself. I will bedrot in your honor on this joyous day.

87033336.text: Eimi I got into Phase connect in Oct of last year, and when I was scouring people to watch I saw your silly emote :EimiLOL: in the panko chat being used a lot so I checked you out. My first real stream I watched of you I forgot what we were talking about but what I thought was funny was you saying gang (& something along the lines or twin/opp or jitğŸ’€)in normal conversation. I always think it's funny, the juxtaposition of "silly cute anime girls" using gen Z/East/West Coast ebonic slang like there from the trenchesğŸ’€and it was relatable to me coming from a "lower-middle class neighborhood", I never really saw that before watching a Vtuber, usually it's just me or my friends or people in different type of circles that talk like that that maybe aren't into Vtubing and that was nice to see for once. What I'm trying to say is I think you're relatable and genuinely funny and interesting to engage with and talk to on stream. I honestly wish I found you sooner but I think everything happens for a reasonâ˜ï¸, and interacting with your community n yourself has been enriching to my life and I hope that I can enrich theirs and yours in the long run I want to be a part of this community more and do more things in it. You're truly one of a kind with what you say and how you portray yourself, I hope you have many more birthdays growing and being yourself only good can come of it, and I will be supporting it. You and your buddies at phase have consumed my life mostly for the better and I wouldn't have it any other way happy birthday Eimi Isamiâ¤ï¸ğŸ¹

87246612.text: Happy birthday, Eimi! Here's to another year of your laughter, singing, personality, and the joy you bring. You entertain us and makes us smile every time we see you.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY EIMI!!!! While the amount of streams i was able to catch this year were small due to timezones (i am a fake ham i know) . Every single one has been an absolute delight! I wish for you to continue being awesome (or whatever a hamster does) for many years to come. eimi love!

87424954.text: Eimi Isami! Congratulations on making it to the big league! It must've been a journey, for sure! I can't believe, nay, I've always believed you'll get to where you are right now! Once again, congratulations on making it to Arima Kinen 2025 back in December, we expect more great things from you! Oh yeah, and happy birthday.

87500316.text:
wow. your third birthday has come up so fast. i still remember last year, where you read the kudoboard while playing filipino roleplay on roblox. oh how the times have changed. last year i said i'd keep it short and then wrote an essay, but this year i will actually keep it relatively short.

this year had a lot of ups and downs for me, with the downs being bigger than the ups. it was probably my toughest year to date. i'm happy i made it through, but some of that needs to genuinely be credited to you. mostly every day, no matter what it is i was going through, i could always fall back on the Ever So Reliable Eimi Isami Stream. they mainly made me happy. and Roger made me cry. i felt a lot this year in general, but a lot of good came through you. thank you very very much for being here and for doing what you do. while it may not be the most obvious thing, you've made a legitimate, genuine positive impact on a lot of people, myself included. when i look back at 2025, i can't see myself as having gotten through it so well if it weren't for you.

thank you again for everything. i am so happy and grateful you are here, and i'm sure the labhams all feel the same. happy birthday eimi, and much love.

87585944.text:
Hi Eimi! Oh boy! 3 years old! It has been so amazing spending these last couple of years with you. You have easily become one of the most important sources of joy in my life ever since I first wandered into one of your streams after teacher school. Because of your community I have managed to make so many awesome friends that I never would have met otherwise. Your charm, talent, humor, and empathy shines in every project you throw yourself into and I'm always excited to tune in and see what you've cooked. Please take care of yourself this year, and I can't wait to see what the next 12 months hold in store.

Your favorite teacher,

Yeorick

87588124.text:
EIMI ISAMI OF PHASECONNECT GENERATION EUPOHRIA; NO OCCASION IS AS JOYOUS AS THIS, OH MOST HAPPY OF BIRTHDAYS TO OUR ONE AND ONLY!!!

It has been approximately 297 days, or 10 months, since I've found your channel, and an approximate 5 months since I have been a member, and God do I wish it happened much sooner, augh!

I never expected I'd find someone that'd reach my heart as quick as you would've, with your kindness, hard work ethic, authenticity, or relatability.

To say you were an absolute pleasure to watch thus far would be a disservice; you have been a great addition to my day, one I started incorporating into my routine no matter the circumstance.

I find it hard to focus on one thing to praise, whether it's your amazing singing voice, how much laughter you bring, how real you keep it all... you are special, Eimi.

You've helped me get through what could be my worst year to date, whether you realize it or not, and that ended some of my most miserable days in a smile at the very least, as I got to hear you, laugh with you (or at you); you've brought joy to many of us, and we are all so thankful.

And well, they say chat reflects the streamer, and my goodness does this ring true when it comes to the wonderful cove of hams you've gathered around you, who all reflect your very own kindness, it has been an absolute treasure to be amongst them, as they only elevated my own love for you, only someone as wonderful as you are would manage to have such good souls!

I've yapped long enough, but regardless!

Thank you, Eimi Isami, for being the person that you are.

Thank you for being born, and thank you for allowing us to be with you along the ride, and for being with us.

P.S: WE, yes WE, will all be making it through this 2026!!!!!!

HAPPY BIRTHDAY, THANK YOU FOR BEING MY KAMIOSHI, THANK YOU, THANK YOU, EIMI LOOOOOVE!!!!!

87589897.text:
HAPPY 2 YEAR ANNIVERSARY EIMI!!!!
wait what do you mean its actually 3 years? what do you mean its already 2026????
Hampter, i just wanted to say, thank you for all the fun streams and amazing covers you've done, even if im not able to watch them live most of the time, the vods still make my day anyways, i wish for not only this year, but all the future years will treat you well, i'll always be hoping for the best for ya, always cheering for your happiness and success!!!

Happy Birthday. Another time to mark your precious life that was birthed to this same plane of existence again. What I want to tell you is simply put; how heroic your visage is flying towards your dreams, and how you are so great just by living every day! The sounds and every breath even if not reverberated through to; all becomes someone's fuel, becoming someone's hope. You must have had all with you the power to have changed a few human paths at the very least. Thank you. Wherever you may aim to be next, cheering for you WILL follow.

You've surely done superb hamster, I can only believe you will do even better above and beyond. Because I know you have done your best and will do your best.

87590639.text:
Oh my gosh, Happy Birthday Eimi!!!!ğŸ‰ğŸ‰

Can't believe it, it's been a whole year since I started watching you. It's been longer, but I only watched clips, so when I started watching your streams is when I considered myself a Labham. The times I got the chance to watch your streams, whether I was glued to the screen and typing in chat or having you as 2nd monitor/BG noise, I was soooooo cheesed :33. From your silly moments to the crashouts, I genuinely loved it all. Your eccentric and creative personality carries the stream (along with chat) as I'm slapping my bellay and calling myself a chud. I wished I tuned to more of your streams but didn't/couldn't cos either work got busy, was doing something else, or was planning to play said game (in the future) you were streaming and didn't want to get spoiled. Speaking of games. Thanks to you and the hams, I've added plenty of VNs, and games that you've streamed, that I'd never considered playing into my backlog. I'm honestly happy to be part of the Labhams community, y'all have made 2025 a fun year when it felt a bit gloomy. And I know 2025 wasn't the best year, but I hope us Hams can keep supporting you and make your dreams a reality! You're happiness is always our priority and your drive to keep streaming gives me hope to move forward.

â¤ï¸â¤ï¸Thanks for being my fun, cute, silly, ham oshiâ¤ï¸â¤ï¸

87591348.text:
Boss ham!

I know there's a lot of hams with a lot to say, so I won't make mine too long. Thank you for being you, Runie was right when she said there's no stream like an Eimi stream. You provide something for all of us that we can't get anywhere else, and you make us all very happy. I hope that one day you can be even a fraction as happy as you make us.

Happy birthday boss, we all love you very much. Can't wait for another two years!

87591576.text:
Three years ago I woke up in a cold sweat, a foreign voice echoed in my skull with a deep timbre, a sinister message accompanied by screams of the damned,

"The Orange One cometh."

Henceforth I drew unto my phone to witness horrors such as Little Witch Nobeta and Spooky's Jumpscare Mansion. Through these traumatic experiences I lost my very soul to the Orange One, the one called Amy Salami, and forevermore became a mindless thrall to the left clicking grindset.

I have slept not a moment since for I have been condemned to the coalposting mines of the Wokeham. This is my plea for mercy.

87591732.text:
Eimi came to me at a time in my life where I had been isolated after being bullied out of my friend group. My schizophrenia was so bad that I stopped using social media and only watched Youtube because it was the only thing people couldn't see my activity on. I had almost no friends left and spent most of the day immobile convinced people were tracking my phone's movement. I didn't even play Final Fantasy because I was afraid they would come find me in game and harass me. Eimi was companionship in someone I felt was just like me when I had no social stimulation.

After discovering Eimi, my life changed a lot. I became corpo. I stopped having time to be in streams. In these two years, I moved twice, I held my still baby (ğŸˆ ) in the hospital, my apartment flooded, I got mold poisoning, my corpo exploded.. I've lost count of how many things have been added to the concoction of PTSD that has paralyzed me. To say I'm doing bad is an understatement. You don't realize how awful it's been until you say it out loud all together.

I am still standing anyways, but so is Eimi. In a world where I feel like a strange and disgusting beast unlike every other, Eimi stands tall with everyone else while being just like me. She streams what she wants, sleeps all day, and fucks around, and she still gets to stand up there. It stood as a sign that someone like me could do it. And I did do it. I knew I could, because she could. Even through every hell I have lived through both during my time as a corpo and now, and through everything Eimi has lived, the both of us have stayed regardless.

2026 is projected to be better, according to the THE PROPHECY (Trust Me). It's supposed to look up a lot. I have my hopes on what this means for me, but at this point in time, I just pray it means I can live without fear and get out of bed. I still gotta stream, cuz Eimi streams all the time and that's crazy. If Eimi can do it, so can I, and so must I. So for 2026, I have to just keep running. My journey has felt like I'm running as fast as I can to try to meet a blinding light that is suspiciously hamster shaped. No matter how close, I will never feel that I've touched it, so I just have to keep running. I don't know if I ever will touch it, but I think maybe it's better off that way, so that it compels me to run forever.

Maybe this year I will finally be able to make you a birthday present, but I find myself pushed to the brink with a drained body today. One day I will make something. If I'm really lucky, maybe that will be tomorrow. In the meantime, I am spending my birthday at the mall with my best friend, the same way I spent it the first ever day I learned I'd be becoming corpo, January 8th, 2024.

How lucky I am to be born so close to someone like this. How odd, it feels, to look up to someone so much like me, the me I've admonished for its endless faults.

I hope the birthday merch this year has eimi cocaine lets all smoke crack and die

Knelli Cifarelli

87592994.text:

87637262.text:
I can't believe it, two full years, how time flies. Thanks to you and the wonderful, inviting space you have created I managed to make friends, reach out to others, and come out of the ol' shell. Hell, the 2 out of the 3 times I have flown have been to bug you and the Euphoria girls live at cons.

It is always fun to watch and fall to sleep to your left-clicking adventures, send a colored box or two to bully you, and as opposed to most, you bully back. You understand bantz, and I respect that. Also thanks to you I managed to pick up singing. I have really improved and performed some to small crowds, so thank you for growing my horizons even further (I would show the video, but the audio is quiet). I can't wait for next year's barrel of fun, and Phasecon is looking to be nuts. My brother is already talking about bringing and pissing in a ball pit.

Thanks,

Solid Skelie

HAPPY BIRTHDAY BOSS !!! As your self proclaimed most washed labham I got off my bum ass and started and...actually worked on something? truth be told i'm going to AnimeLa this weekend so irl shit has gotten in my way, i'll finish it when i get back i pinky promise so if you found this even FIVE percent as funny as I did laughing my ass off drawing it please just gimme a little more time. PRETTY PLEASE atleast wait for me to get home before you sent the hams to slime me ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­ I don't want my stupid little chudham life to end when my body hits the concrete in fucking long beach california.
My goofy ass aside, happy fucking birthday man, to be a little more sincere I look up to you in a lotta ways boss. I fw your art heavy, your music heavy, and you're simply very funny and clever and seeing you deny it every time its brought up makes me laugh.
Because I want to develop my bullshit patchwork of skills into being even half as good as you and actually start making stuff. Additionally it makes me think about how often I do that whenever i got even a hint of a compliment. SO my bitchass doesn't have any room to be "humble" just yet. On a final very personal note, your skills aside I just like you man ^-^. 87732123.text:
Happy birthday Eimi!

I've been watching you since sometime in 2024. First it was clips, then I started watching streams. You inspired me to start clipping. The more I watched you the fonder I grew of you. Your drawing streams are so much fun, you inspire me in my own art as well. And you were so supportive of me and all the stupid stuff I did. And then you did the 3D stream, and I fell for you so hard. You were just so, so, so cute. And you were so caring of me on my birthday, you checked up on me. At that moment you weren't funny, or creative, or witty, or whimsical, you were just kind. I felt loved, and I had the best birthday of my life, I was the happiest I had ever been. I'm truly happy I found you, and can call you my oshi.

Love da hampter. Thank you for making my every day brighter. I want to make you smile the same way you make me smile. May we remain oshi and fan forever.

87732693.text:
Happy birthday, Eimi!

Thank you for being such an awesome hamster. I'm glad I got to speak to you at OffKai even if I just awawawa'd at you.

Here's to many more years!

87733132.text:
Happy birthday, Eimi!

Glad we get to celebrate your third birthday.

Wow, it has been 3 years already? Time goes fast when we spend fun times with whimsical goofy hampter.

I wish you have an amazing week and yummy foods.

Here's to another year together. Thanks for entertaining us until now.

We always acknowledge and appreciate your hard work.

Keep it up, Eimi!

87733216.text:
Happy Birthday Eimi! I hope you've had a fun year. Not only are your streams entertaining, but I always look forward to any Meet & Greet with you in it. I can forgive a few hit and runs with the offkai roomba. I hope the next year is good for you, and stop being so hard on yourself. You do good work, and it shows with how dedicated the labhams are.

I hope you enjoy the spooky dancing skeleton gif

87733225.text:
Happy Birthday Eimi,

Even though I started the year only tuning in to a couple of your streams, these past few months I decided to start watching you more and more. Your immense kindness for others and how it seeped into the community you created stood out to me immediately. Even though I haven't been here for long, I've really come to enjoy my time with your streams and talking with the rest of the labhams. Whether it's playing games on stream, or releasing music, it's easy to tell you put a lot of work into your content. Your singing voice is truly special and your range truly made covers like Spoken For and " Marshmallow" shine letting me listen to them over and over. Looking forward to whatever you put.out in the future . Here's to another wonderful year with you boss ham.

adjksad.text: Happy Birthday Eimi!!!! 2026 will be your year (trust)

skdjalkdjlaskd.text:
HAPPY BIRTHDAY HAMTER!!
I am a lurker, but I love your streams so much and am mostly a vod watcher (shoutout to my voddies)
Your streams have really helped me reconnect with that cringey fangirl side of myself i thought was gone from so long ago. I adore watching you play visual novels hearing your quippy comments and amazing voice acting. I mostly love to draw you while watching whatever shenanigans you cook up (think ive drawn you the most). Your voice, art, humor, and personality are so fun and I love how you can be yourself.
Thank you for the hours of entertainment, for being here when i felt like couldn't tackle the world and for bringing a smile to my face.
Watching how much your community loves you fills me with so much happiness knowing so many can love such a silly hamster.
I'm not the best with words.. so hopefully this fanart is enough to show my love and appreciation for you and your content.
PS WHERE MY FEMHAMS AT.... no seriously... where are you?

- Ovi ğŸ’›
